properties.description: Contains creation of all bronze tables in one SQL Script

content.query:
use nyc_taxi_ldw

--create taxi_zone table
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE nyc_taxi_ldw.bronze.taxi_zone
    (   LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15))
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format
    );
